title:
Characterization of Lipschitz functions via commutators of maximal
  operators on slice spaces
abstract:
Let $0 \leq \alpha<n$, $M_{\alpha}$ be the fractional maximal operator,
$M^{\sharp}$ be the sharp maximal operator and $b$ be the locally integrable
function. Denote by $[b, M_{\alpha}]$ and $[b, M^{\sharp}]$ be the commutators
of the fractional maximal operator $M_{\alpha}$ and the sharp maximal operator
$M^{\sharp}$. In this paper, we show some necessary and sufficient conditions
for the boundedness of the commutators $[b, M_{\alpha}]$ and $[b, M^{\sharp}]$
on slice spaces when the function $b$ is the Lipschitz function, by which some
new characterizations of the non-negative Lipschitz function are obtained
